name: Intermarketing Agency
description:
Intermarketing Agency is an integrated, creatively-driven and service-led agency with a focus on ROI. We have offices in Leeds, London, Amsterdam and Sydney.
 
We combine 30 years of brand building expertise with the ability to execute ideas in any channel. Whether it’s product or service, consumer or business, brand focused or response driven, our work is a culmination of sound insight, unrivalled creativity and impeccable delivery.
